bib.abstract:
Diapositive 1 Page 1 1 Journée des doctorants - 6 juin 2018 1 How to capture the 
Mediterranean forested landscape complexity using remote-sensing tools Samuel Alleaume, 
Marc Lang, Jean-Baptiste Féret, Ibrahima Diouf, Sandra Luque, Samuel Alleaume (samuel.alleaume@irstea.fr) 
Page 2 2 A very complex and heterogeneous landscape ➢ Mediterranean landscape is 
characterise by is complexity and heteogeneity. ➢ Contribute to the high level of biodiversity 
of this ecosystem. ➢ Mediterranean ecosystem is recognized as an hot spot for biodiversity ➢ 
Mediterranean basin host 10% of the floristic richness over just 1% of world’s surface Page 3 
3 http://www.wikigarrigue.info/wakka.php?wiki=cquoilagarrigue (modified) young forest 
grassland low mattoral high mattoral Mediterranean forest > 100 yrs A very complex and 
heterogeneous landscape result from natural succession, controled by perturbations Page 4 4 …
